Message-ID: <45E54DB7.6070309@jagex.com> 
Date: Wed, 28 Feb 2007 09:39:03 +0000 
From: Jagex Copyright Team <copyright@jagex.com> 
User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.9 (Windows/20061207) 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
To:  abuse@theplanet.com 
Subject: http://myrune.com/store 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-15; format=flowed 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Feb 2007 09:40:32.0977 (UTC)
FILETIME=[7DB7FC10:01C75B1C] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
To whom it may concern, 
 
I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am  
authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. The information in  
the notification is accurate. I have good faith to belief that the use  
of the material identified below has not been authorised by the owner,  
its agents or the law. Please promptly remove the infringing material or

disable access to it in accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright

Act. 
 
Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited, UK registered  
company number 03982706. 
 
Name and/or description of the copyrighted work which has been  
infringed: The sale of in-game RuneScape gold. 
 
Description of the Infringing Material: This site undertakes the sale of

  items in our game RuneScape for real world money. Under our game's  
terms, which players must agree to prior to commencing their in-game  
account, such activity is strictly prohibited. It is not possible to  
exchange in-game goods without becoming bound by our terms. This site is

therefore inducing a breach of contract. 
 
If you review the other sections of the website: http://myrune.com, you

will see that this site is set up solely for the purposes of discussing

our game RuneScape. In the real world trading section of the website,  
you will also see that they claim to sell items for 'RS2', a common  
abbreviation for our game. 
 
Location of the Infringing Material: http://myrune.com/store 
 
Date: Wednesday 28th February 2007 
 
I can be contacted at: 
 
Name: Mohammed Khan 
Email: copyright@jagex.com 
Address: St Andrews House, 90 St Andrews Road, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire

CB4 1DL, United Kingdom. 
 
Regards, 
 
 
Mohammed Khan 
Jagex Ltd. 
 
--  
 
IMPORTANT NOTICE 
 
The sender does not guarantee that this message, including any
attachment, is secure or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be
privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. If you are not the
intended recipient, do not disclose or copy it or its contents. Please
telephone or email the sender and delete the message entirely from your
system. 
Jagex Limited is a company registered in England & Wales with company
number 03982706 and a registered office at St. Andrews House, 90 St.
Andrews Road, Cambridge, CB4 1DL, UK.
